Question
========
A particular study compares the weight loss of women between the ages of 30 and 45 who participate in an experiment. Five different weight loss programs are compared. A total of 25 women participate, five per diet type. An ANOVA is used to compare the results.


The test size for this test is 3.45. What is the correct way to report it?

Answerlist
----------
* F(24) = 3.45
* F(5, 25) = 3.45
* F(4, 24) = 3.45
* F(4, 20) = 3.45
